payment.question: When and how do I receive my money?
payment.answer: You receive your commission within 72 business hours after the client pays. We accept bank transfer, PayPal, Bizum or the method you prefer.

referral.question: How are my referrals counted?
referral.answer: Any contact you introduce to us who hires our services counts as a referral. Just let me know who you're referring and I'll confirm the connection with you.

tracking.question: How do I know the status of my referrals?
tracking.answer: I'll keep you informed directly via WhatsApp or email whenever a referral advances in the process. You'll have full visibility of the progress.

friends.question: Can I refer family members?
friends.answer: Of course! Anyone who needs a website, whether it's a direct contact, friend of a friend, or your client who needs to improve their online presence.

faq.title: Questions You're Probably Asking Yourself
faq.subtitle: The answers you need to make the best decision for your business

pricing.question: What does the price include?
pricing.answer: All prices include design, development, basic SEO setup and 30 days of free support. Hosting and domain are usually separate costs (we help you set them up).

timeline.question: How long does it take us to build a website?
timeline.answer: Simple pages: 3-5 days. Online stores: 5-7 days. Custom projects: 1-2 weeks. We are the fastest in the industry - no months of delays.

revisions.question: How many revisions are included?
revisions.answer: Simple pages: 3 rounds. Online stores: 4 rounds. Custom projects: Unlimited revisions. We want you to be 100% satisfied.

hosting.question: Do you provide hosting?
hosting.answer: For simple websites with normal traffic, I provide free hosting the first year. For online stores, hosting is included in the monthly plan. For high-traffic sites, we recommend reliable hosting providers.

maintenance.question: What about ongoing maintenance?
maintenance.answer: We provide 30 days of free support after launch. Ongoing maintenance packages are available for long-term support and updates.

payment.question: What are the payment terms?
payment.answer: 50% upfront to start the project, 50% upon completion. For larger projects, we can discuss milestone-based payments.

seo.question: Is SEO included?
seo.answer: Basic SEO setup is included in all packages. Advanced SEO strategies and continuous optimization can be added as an additional service.

competitors.question: Why not use a cheaper freelancer?
competitors.answer: Most freelancers aren't really cheaper, and the few who are usually don't offer the same quality, guarantees, and ongoing support that I provide. If you find someone with better prices and better service, let me know and I might adjust my prices to match or exceed their offer.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introduction: This privacy policy describes how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use our website.

dataCollection.title: Data We Collect
dataCollection.content: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you fill out our contact forms, including your name, email address, phone number, and any messages you send us.

dataUsage.title: How We Use Your Data
dataUsage.content: We use your information to respond to your inquiries, provide our services, and improve our website. We do not sell or share your personal information with third parties.

dataProtection.title: Data Protection
dataProtection.content: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this privacy policy, please contact us at ewejose@gmail.com

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.message: We use cookies to improve your experience on our website.
